data.text:
The flight took five days - with 59 hours in the air - and had seven stops along the way in Darwin, Singapore, Calcutta, Karachi, Cairo, Castel Benito & Rome.​

On board were three pilots, one navigator, one radio operator, two flight engineers, three cabin crew & 29 passengers. https://t.co/w5luH5jSmi
